code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_LMS_Portal] --> Login: User Credentials
    Login --> TokensGenerated: Success
    
    state TokensGenerated {Education_GradeSync] --> AccessToken_Stateless
        [Education_ContentCDN] --> RefreshToken_Stateful
    }
    
    AccessToken_Stateless --> Active: valid for 15m
    Active --> Expired: after 15m
    Expired --> Refresh: use RefreshToken
    
    RefreshToken_Stateful --> StoredInDB: Active for 7d
    StoredInDB --> Rotated: Refresh RPC called
    Rotated --> DeletedFromDB: Old Token
    Rotated --> StoredInDB: New Token Pair Issued
    
    StoredInDB --> Revoked: DeleteUser called
    Revoked --> [Education_ContentCDN]
    
    Expired --> [Education_StudentDB]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
